name: Crystal Feud
description:
Enable fullscreen for the full experience.

Combine all of one color or mix 2 different colors to summon creatures. The more red crystals combined will make the creature deal more damage, yellow will give them more health, and blue will give them more shield. 

Each combination of the primary colors creates a unique creature with a unique effect.

  • Red: Attacks when summoned and during attack phase.
  • Yellow: Heals adjacent allies when summoned.
  • Blue: Lowers the level of an enemy creature when summoned.
  • Purple: Reflects damage when attacked.
  • Orange: Attacks the whole row instead of a single target.
  • Green: Boosts the shield of adjacent allies when summoned.
